channel.title: Blog on Tech 4 N00bs
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Tech 4 N00bs

item.title: GitHub: 10 Tips for Good Pull Requests
item.description: Learn how to write pull requests that are easy to review and accept.

item.title: Git for Skeptics: Part 2 - Why is saving changes so freaking complicated?
item.description: Learn how to make and save changes using git, and the purpose for add, commit, and push.

item.title: Git for Skeptics: Part 1 - Why do I need a million copies of this folder?
item.description: Learn what makes version control different from text editing software. Review the purpose for forking, cloning, and branching files.
